text: Anata gataga tsuma o ribetsu shi, sadame rareta kikan ga manryo shite soho no goi no shita ni, dato ni hanashi ga matomattanaraba, ka no on'na-ra no kekkon o (mae no) otto wa samatagete wa naranai. Kore (oshie) wa, anata gata no naka arra to saigo no hi o shinjiru mono e no kunkaidearu. Sore wa anata gata ni totte mottomo seijodeari keppakudearu. Anata gata wa shiranai ga, arra wa shitte ora reru
